multiplechoiceresponse.p:
Examine the following statement:
If it is not the case that JavaScript is type safe and JavaScript is interpreted, then programmers should be extra careful or they should use a different language.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: How many operators are used in the statement above?

div.p:
The four operators are:
Conditional (if-then)
Negation (it is not the case that)
Conjunction (and)
Disjunction (or)
